author: jbonofre
msg: The maven release profile is provided by the Apache POM (including GPG, etc).
We remove the overrided release profile and define the modules set in the main POM.

author: brane
msg: Regain a wee bit of hope, oh ye who entered here!
* tools/dist/checksums.py: New script that replaces the md5sum and sha1sum
commands on those systems that don't have them; e.g., Mac OS X or Windows.

author: chrisg
msg: Added missing Country (_DE) for a translated label
